webhooks.deleteRequest: Are you sure you want to delete

dialogHistory.title: History of attempts on this webhook

webhooks.empty-row: There were no webhooks found mathing your search.
webhooks.info: WebHooks is a capability where our system can notify your web program anytime something of interest happens. For example, if someone completes a phone call, we can let you know in real-time and tell you who they were talking to, and for how long.
webhooks.info2: To use this feature, configure a URL to your web server and tell us which type of events you want to be notified about, and in what format. This feature applies to your entire account and any apps within this account, but not sub-accounts.
webhooks.warning: You cannot save Custom Data with the same identifier. Please enter a different identifier.
webhooks.historyTooltip: View the list of attempts on this webhook
webhooks.noAttempts: The system didn't detect any attempt on this webhook...
webhooks.noWebhooks: There are no webhook configured on this account.
webhooks.emptySearch: There were no webhook found matching your search.
webhooks.reenableTooltip: Webhooks that you manually disabled will stay that way. Only hooks that have been disabled by the server will be re-enabled.
webhooks.errorTooltip: This Webhook has been disabled by the server for the following reason:
webhooks.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this Webhook?

webhookEdition.nameSectionTitle: Let's name your Webhook and decide what event will trigger it
webhookEdition.methodSectionTitle: Select a request method, the server to send the info to, and how many re-try attempts the hook should make
webhookEdition.customDataSectionTitle: Add custom data to your Webhook (Optional)
webhookEdition.groupSectionTitle: Tag this Webhook to a Group if you want to categorize it further

webhookAttempts.noAttempts: The system didn't detect any attempt on this webhook...
